ar.com.zir.mail.server

Class ServerConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • ar.com.zir.mail.server.ServerConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ServerConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class is used to handle the communication with the mail client

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServerConnection(java.net.Socket client)
      Constructor that receives the socket where the mail client is writing to

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void run()
      Method that receives the mail object and send it to the utility class for sending.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerConnection

        public ServerConnection(java.net.Socket client)
        Constructor that receives the socket where the mail client is writing to
        Parameters:
        client - the socket where the mail client is writing to

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Method that receives the mail object and send it to the utility class for sending. If no error was thrown, it sends a Boolean.TRUE response to the mail client. Else, it sends a Boolean.FALSE to the mail client.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        See Also:
        Mail, MailUtils
